name: Velvet Bud
description: Like the name suggests, Velvet Bud will produce a smoke that is smooth like velvet. A mostly sativa that crosses Dutch Treat and Blueberry, this fruity strain is a great choice for anyone struggling with depression, anxiety, and stress.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Energetic, Euphoric, Talkative, Creative, Lack of Appetite, Cramps, Inflammation, Muscle Spasms, Pain, Dry Eyes, Anxious, Dry Mouth
